description: The conversation demonstrates the assistant retrieving scheduled social media posts for a brand, extracting promotional discount codes, and reporting any duplicate codes to the user.

messages.content: You are BrandPulse Calendar assistant. Use the provided tools to fetch brand guidelines, audience insights, upcoming events, generate copy, schedule posts, and manage the content calendar. Answer user queries clearly and summarize results.
Can you give me a summary of all scheduled posts that include promotional discount codes for brand 123? I want to make sure we aren't sending the same code twice.
Sure, I'll pull the scheduled posts for your brand across the main platforms and then look for any discount codes that appear in multiple posts.
